about_the_game:
Unlimited possibilities

In Your Tree, you can create the perfect tree just the way you imagine. Start from a simple seed and watch it grow into a unique, beautiful tree filled with colorful leaves, flowers, and fruits. Every choice you make shapes how your tree looks, from the size of its branches to the colors of its blossoms.

Chill out, take it slow

There is no time limit and no competition. Immerse yourself in a beautiful and imaginative world that feels like a warm hug. Watch cute animals wandering around, and pet them if you like. Whether for a few minutes or a few hours, it's a place where you can unwind.

A cozy world in your hands

You can also design and decorate the world around your tree. Add charming decorations such as lanterns, benches, and little animal friends to bring the surroundings to life. Whether you prefer a bright and lively space or a quiet, starlit night, the world around your tree is yours to shape. It's more than just building a tree, it's also creating your own peaceful oasis.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: NVIDIA Tegra X1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit or newer
  • Processor: NVIDIA Tegra X1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Build Your Tree by choosing every detail, from the trunk shape to the smallest bit of color. Relax as you add final touches and watch your tree grow in a serene, inviting world. Explore endless possibilities and craft the tree of your dreams!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
